content: RT 6-22 rivet nose pieces Rivet nose pieces for fastening steel, aluminum and stainless-steel rivets with your RT 6-22 cordless rivet tool (available sizes include 2.4mm to 4.8mm | 3/32”to 3/16”) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for specialty power tools ### FEATURES:Features Multiple sizes available – choose from 2.4mm, 3.0mm, 3.2mm, 4.0mm, or 4.8mm to suit your riveting applications Replacement part – each package comes in a set of 5 to replace your lost or damaged rivet nose pieces Multiple sizes available – choose 3/32”, 1/8”, 5/32”, or 3/16” to suit your riveting applications Applications Retaining nose pieces help prevent rivets from falling out when working downwards Replacement nose pieces for the RT 6-22 cordless rivet tool ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2319078 - Nose piece RT 6 RN 2.4mm (5) - Package Size 1 pc - 2319077 - Nose piece RT 6 RN 3.0-3.2mm (5) - Package Size 1 pc - 2319076 - Nose piece RT 6 RN 4.0mm (5) - Package Size 1 pc - 2319075 - Nose piece RT 6 RN 4.8mm (5) - Package Size 1 pc
